REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0699 reute b f BC-BUNDESBANK-LEAVES-CRE 03-05 0052

TEXT.TITLE: BUNDESBANK LEAVES CREDIT POLICIES UNCHANGED
TEXT.BODY: The Bundesbank left credit policies unchanged after today's regular meeting of its council, a spokesman said in answer to enquiries. The West German discount rate remains at 3.0 pct, and the Lombard emergency financing rate at 5.0 pct. REUTER
